name: files.remote.share
desc: Share a remote file into a channel.

channels.desc: Comma-separated list of channel IDs where the file will be shared.

external_id.desc: The globally unique identifier (GUID) for the file, as set by the app registering the file with Slack.  Either this field or file or both are required.

file.desc: Specify a file registered with Slack by providing its ID. Either this field or external_id or both are required.

errors.channel_not_found: At least one of the values passed for `channels` was invalid.
errors.file_not_found: No file with the requested ID found.
errors.no_bot_user_for_app: Cannot call the Remote Files endpoints unless app has associated bot user
errors.not_in_channel: Authenticated user is not in at least one of the the provided channels.
